name.en: Seminar in Philosophy of Kant II

goal.en: The lecture is to continue the class of “Kant's Study of Moral Philosophy I”. In this lecture, I will use the perspective of Kant's theory of moral philosophy in the research of Confucianism, especially the Confucian school of the Song and Ming Dynasties, and will express the achievements of contemporary Neo-Confucian scholars' research on Kant's moral philosophy.
goal.ch: 繼續康德道德哲學研究I課程，藉著康德道德哲學理論，對儒學，尤其是宋明理學的程朱陸王二系作深入的探究，並表達當代新儒學學者對康德道德哲學的研究成果。

content.en:
1. Introduction to the course: The main idea of Kant's moral philosophy-the relationship between Kant's moral philosophy and contemporary neo-Confucianism, from “Groundwork of the Metaphysic of Morals” to “The Critique of Practical Reason”
2. Analysis of pure practical reason (1) The principle of pure practical reason
3. Analysis of pure practical reason (2) The object of pure practical reason
4. The motivation of pure practical reason
5. Dialectical theory of pure practical reason
6. The postulates of pure practical reason
7. Mr. Mou Zongsan's criticism of Kant's solution to the problem of "perfect good"
content.ch:
1. 課程介紹：康德的道德哲學大意─從《道德底形而上學之基本原理》到《實踐理性批判》，康德道德哲學與當代新儒學理論的關係
2. 純粹實踐理性的分析論(一)純粹實踐理性的原理
3. 純粹實踐理性的分析論(二)純粹實踐理性的對象
4. 純粹實踐理性的動力（動機）
5. 純粹實踐理性的辯證論
6. 純粹實踐理性的設準
7. 牟宗三先生對康德「圓善」問題的解決之批評
